page.title: 01KILMARNOCK AND HURLFORD
page.content: This is a general descripiton of our D block. {New Farm Loch}is a very new Council housing estate in Kilmarnock, which was built approximately fifteen years ago. The A77 from Ayr to Glasgow runs past New Farm Loch. In our D block there is a railway line that is one of the main railways to London. Our D block has approximately 66% open space and grass land and 34% housing. In our D block 50% of the houses are private and the rest are council houses. {Crookedholm and Hurlford}are two small villages which are in very close proximity to Kilmarnock. The river Irvine runs through a part of Hurlford. In our D block we have a hospital for old people.
